messages.title: LETS GET BREXIT DONE, DELIVER DEMOCRACY - SO WE CAN GET ON WITH OUR PRIORITIES

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Securing £400 million for a brand new hospital.
Implementing CCTV and new trains on the Central Line.
Fighting Labour's plan to charge £12.50 to drive to Whipps Cross Hospital.
Taking away 15 minutes free parking in Waltham Forest, working on 30 minutes free parking.
Opposing high-rise, high-density development in Chingford, Highams Park, and South Woodford.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting for any other party here in Chingford & Woodford Green risks Jeremy Corbyn getting into Number 10.

issues.brexitEurope: Once we have left the European Union
issues.economy: How we funded for schools and colleges
issues.education: The rebuilding of our hospital, higher funding for schools and colleges
issues.environment: Opposing high-rise, high-density development in Chingford, Highams Park, and South Woodford, and the waste incinerator at Edmonton.
issues.government: Getting extra funding for our schools and supporting the plan to put 20,000 more police on the streets
issues.health: How securing £400 million to rebuild Whipps Cross Hospital, £33.9 billion for the NHS
issues.labourEmployment: I have delivered record levels of employment
issues.lawCrime: Getting 1,369 extra police officers in the first recruitment wave.
issues.transport: Improving Local Transport, and getting more trains on the Central Line.
issues.socialWelfare: Since 2010 we have helped more people off benefits and into work and the welfare system to make sure that work pays.

community.content: Support our High Streets by taking away 15 minutes free parking in Waltham Forest, working on 30 minutes free parking.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP in Chingford & Woodford Green for the last 27 years, and I have always put the needs of my constituents first and foremost.

examples: £33.9 billion for the NHS
20,000 more police
1,369 extra police officers in the first recruitment wave
Once we have left the European Union, we can move on and focus on the things that matter to the people of Chingford & Woodford Green.
Stop Labour's Tax on Driving which will hit pensioners, low paid earners, shift workers, small businesses and even emergency vehicles.
My Plan for Chingford & Woodford Green
Improving Local Transport
Support our High Streets
Protecting our Environment
More funding for every pupil in every school
Securing £400 million to rebuild Whipps Cross Hospital
Once we have left the European Union, we can move on and focus on the things that matter to the people of Chingford & Woodford Green.
£33.9 billion for the NHS
Stop Labour's plan to charge you £12.50 to drive to Whipps Cross Hospital
Opposing high-rise, high-density development in Chingford, Highams Park, and South Woodford.
I helped stop a Labour government from closing Whipps Cross Hospital.
Stop Labour's Tax on Driving which will hit pensioners, low paid earners, shift workers, small businesses and even emergency vehicles.
Voting for any other party here in Chingford & Woodford Green risks Jeremy Corbyn getting into Number 10.
I helped stop a Labour government from closing Whipps Cross Hospital.
Voting for any other party here in Chingford & Woodford Green risks Jeremy Corbyn getting into Number 10.
